definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.chinese: 健談者通常都是善於說謊的人。

sentences.english: As a result they were considerably less talkative than normal.
sentences.chinese: 其結果就是他們明顯不如平時那麼健談。

sentences.english: Want to be the head of sales of petroleum products. Initiative, responsible, communicative.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲成品油銷售主管，主動，有責任心，健談。

sentences.english: They noticed a beautiful, slim, talkative old man.
sentences.chinese: 他們遇到了一位風姿翩翩，削瘦健談的老人。

sentences.english: I can tell you are a conversationalist.
sentences.chinese: 可以說你是一個健談者。

sentences.english: The new comer in our company is voluble.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司新來的同事很健談。

sentences.english: He was one of the most exhausting conversationalists that ever lived.
sentences.chinese: 他是人世間最健談的人之一。
左腦思考者通常十分健談。

sentences.english: They are usually energetic, very talkative, like spliting over things.
sentences.chinese: 他們通常精力旺盛，非常健談，喜歡鑽。

sentences.english: Both Gemini and Sagittarius are great conversationalists and enjoy going out and socializing.
sentences.chinese: 雙子和射手都非常的健談，喜歡外出參加社交活動。

sentences.english: It would be safe to say that Linda and Iare both talkers.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定的是，我和琳達都是很健談的人。

sentences.english: Yihe was amiable to everyone, very expansive, erudite, possessing remarkable view.
sentences.chinese: 一禾待人平易，非常健談，學識淵博，見解獨到。
她是一個非常健談的人。

sentences.english: Even the very best conversationalists would have trouble keeping a conversation going.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最健談的人也會遇到談話不能繼續的情形。

sentences.english: Cris isn't much of a trash talker.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯是沒有太大的垃圾桶健談。

definition: spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
unceasing torrent (idiom)/talking non-stop/gabbling forty to the dozen
